data.title: The Bernard and Anne Spitzer School of Architecture
data.meta_description: Sean Weiss, Chairperson and Associate Professor at NYC's flagship public architecture school, the Spitzer School of Architecture.
data.meta_site_name: The Bernard and Anne Spitzer School of Architecture
data.text:
Celebrating B Arch Students at the Hunts Point/Longwood Development CCNY Studio Award Ceremony

Celebrating the achievements of our B Arch students at the Hunts Point/Longwood Development CCNY Studio Award Ceremony.

Adjunct Lecturer Sasha Topolnytska co-curates “Constructing Hope: Ukraine” Exhibition at Center for Architecture

“Constructing Hope: Ukraine” an exhibition co-curated by Adjunct Lecturer Sasha Topolnytska runs until September 3, 2024, at AIA New York Center for Architecture.

Professor Ifeoma Ebo Wins Prestigious Placement in Climate Change Workshop

Ifeoma Ebo has been selected to be a member of the 2024 Cohort for the Academy for Public Scholarship on the Built Environment: CLIMATE ACTION.
